Title: CNPC inks 27-year deal with QatarEnergy for North Field East LNG, follows Sinopec’s lead
Description: State-owned China National Petroleum Corp. has agreed to buy 4 mtpa of LNG from QatarEnergy for a 27-year term, making it the second Chinese state-owned energy firm after Sinopec to agree to a substantial offtake from Qatar’s planned North Field East LNG expansion project.
Author: CK

Title: Pakistan receives no offers for its six-cargo October-December LNG tender
Description: State-owned Pakistan LNG closed its first tender of the year today to buy six cargoes for delivery between October and December to Port Qasim without awarding it as it received no offers.
Author: CK

Title: Bangladesh agrees 10-year deal with OQ for additional long-term LNG supplies from Oman
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned energy firm Petrobangla has signed a deal with Oman’s state-owned OQ Trading to buy between 0.25 mtpa and 1.5 mtpa of LNG for 10 years from Oman, with supplies to start from 2026.
Author: CK
